subject: Junit Tests in a Jar file ?
msgSnippet: Is it possible to execute junit tests inside a jar file ? When I put my jar file in the classpath the junit gui displays no tests but if I unjar it and put the
messageBody:
Is it possible to execute junit tests inside a jar file ? When I put
my jar file in the classpath the junit gui displays no tests but if I
unjar it and put the class files into a directory on the classpath
they appear without any problem ?
